data.oai_dc:dc: Dipodomys merriami and deserti Read Mapping Output Files

This compressed archive directory contains the mapping files for each individual Dipodomys sample used in the RADseq analysis. Each file is in a sorted BAM format, which can easily be converted to SAM or many other desirable formats. These files have been placed into directories that indicate what species (D. deserti or D. merriami) and population (North or South) the individual sample comes from.
